answers.answer: My husband couldn't do anything right, for either of my pregnancies! Haha, he drove me nuts 90% of the time to the point where i was thinking..crap.. now i'm pregnant and stuck with him. It does get better after your hormones settle, i assure you! Maybe have a talk with him about trying to be more positive, try to be calm and not too aggressive or like you're pointing fingers at him, and let him know you'd like to be more positive and take things one step at a time. I hope things get better for you hun!

I've told him many times and I'm nice about it. He will tell me that he heard good advice on how to "deal" with Me during pregnancy when I told him how not to annoy me lol. He's just stressing me out.

he's probably stressed out to. my husband drove me NUTS about me dieing during labor. I had a repeat c-section the 2nd time, and after a while i was worried about dieing too, and i'm like okay, SHUT up.. I've had it! haha. he got much better after the baby came, i'm sure your boyfriend will too
Lol that is crazy!! After listening to someone for so long it grows on you.. And I think I just need a day without speaking to anyone haha and I hope so! Thanks.
i was thinking the same thing today! I need a whole day to lay in bed, in silence haha!!
You need your rest high blood pressure is nothing to play with. You should be laying down kicking your feet up and laying on your left side to keep the blood pressure down.

That's what I told him. He likes to diagnose me too and I'm like you're not my doctor just shut up! The only time I leave my house is to go see my ob.. I don't do house work because my feet hurt so bad.

question: Sooooooo.... Lately I've had high blood pressure... And swelling... I have toxemia...not yet preeclampsia.. And my fiancé and I don't live together but he Is so far up my butt I just want to scream. . he thinks everything is bad and thinks nothing is going right.. And it makes me so mad when I talk to him because he's soo negative about everything.... His car is in the shop so he's driving mine and it doesn't have ac and he just complains so much... And now he's talking about buying a new car, and he can't afford that because he is just now getting his own apartment and I don't work.. He stresses me out so much that I don't know what to do anymore... He expects me to do all this stuff with him but dang I'm almost 35 weeks pregnant and don't feel like it but he gets mad....  Ugh!!! I have no one to talk to but him and my mom I just feel annoyed.  :(
title: i need someone to talk to.
